trans-unit.source: Provides the ability to iterate through subpaths in a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> and test the types of shapes contained in each subpath.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a capacidade de iterar por subcaminhos em um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> e testar os tipos de formas contidas em cada subcaminho.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> object for which this helper class is to be initialized.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> para o qual esta classe auxiliar deve ser inicializada.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator" /> com o objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: Upon return, contains an array of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structures that represents the points in the path.
trans-unit.target: Após o retorno, contém uma matriz de estruturas <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> que representa os pontos no caminho.

trans-unit.source: Upon return, contains an array of bytes that represents the types of points in the path.
trans-unit.target: Após o retorno, contém uma matriz de bytes que representa os tipos de pontos no caminho.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the starting index of the arrays.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o índice inicial das matrizes.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the ending index of the arrays.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o índice final das matrizes.

trans-unit.source: Copies the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.PathPoints" /> property and <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.PathTypes" /> property arrays of the associated <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> into the two specified arrays.
trans-unit.target: Copia as matrizes da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.PathPoints" /> e da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.PathTypes" /> do <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> associado em duas matrizes especificadas.

trans-unit.source: The number of points copied.
trans-unit.target: O número de pontos copiados.

trans-unit.source: Use the `startIndex` and `endIndex` parameters to copy a specified range of the path data.
trans-unit.target: Use o `startIndex` e `endIndex` parâmetros para copiar um intervalo de dados o caminho especificado.

trans-unit.source: The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OnPaint%2A> event object.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir foi projetado para uso com o Windows Forms e requer <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`, uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OnPaint%2A> objeto de evento.

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: O código executa as seguintes ações:

trans-unit.source: Creates a graphics path.
trans-unit.target: Cria um caminho de gráficos.

trans-unit.source: Populates it with several primitives and some markers.
trans-unit.target: Preenche com vários primitivos e algumas marcadores.

trans-unit.source: Lists the path data on the left side of the screen.
trans-unit.target: Lista o caminho de dados no lado esquerdo da tela.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator> and rewinds it.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator> e Rebobina a ele.

trans-unit.source: Increments the path data index to the second marker.
trans-unit.target: Incrementa o índice de caminho de dados para o segundo marcador.

trans-unit.source: Calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.CopyData%2A> method to copy the path data contained between the start and end indexes to the points and types arrays.
trans-unit.target: Chama o <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.CopyData%2A> método para copiar os dados de caminho contidos entre o início e fim de índices para os pontos e tipos de matrizes.

trans-unit.source: Lists this copied data on the right side of the screen.
trans-unit.target: Lista os dados copiados no lado direito da tela.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of points in the path.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de pontos no caminho.

trans-unit.source: The number of points in the path.
trans-unit.target: O número de pontos no caminho.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Libera todos os recursos usados por esse objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator" />.

trans-unit.source: Calling `Dispose` allows the resources used by this <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator> object to be reallocated for other purposes.
trans-unit.target: Chamando `Dispose` permite que os recursos usados por este <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator> objeto a ser realocada para outros fins.

trans-unit.source: Upon return, contains an array of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structures that represents the points in the path.
trans-unit.target: Após o retorno, contém uma matriz de estruturas <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> que representa os pontos no caminho.

trans-unit.source: Upon return, contains an array of bytes that represents the types of points in the path.
trans-unit.target: Após o retorno, contém uma matriz de bytes que representa os tipos de pontos no caminho.

trans-unit.source: Copies the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.PathPoints" /> property and <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.PathTypes" /> property arrays of the associated <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> into the two specified arrays.
trans-unit.target: Copia as matrizes da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.PathPoints" /> e da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.PathTypes" /> do <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> associado em duas matrizes especificadas.

trans-unit.source: The number of points copied.
trans-unit.target: O número de pontos copiados.

trans-unit.source: The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OnPaint%2A> event object.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir foi projetado para uso com o Windows Forms e requer <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`, uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OnPaint%2A> objeto de evento.

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: O código executa as seguintes ações:

trans-unit.source: Creates a graphics path.
trans-unit.target: Cria um caminho de gráficos.

trans-unit.source: Populates it with several primitives and some markers.
trans-unit.target: Preenche com vários primitivos e algumas marcadores.

trans-unit.source: Lists the path data on the left side of the screen.
trans-unit.target: Lista o caminho de dados no lado esquerdo da tela.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator> and rewinds it.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator> e Rebobina a ele.

trans-unit.source: Increments the path data index to the second marker.
trans-unit.target: Incrementa o índice de caminho de dados para o segundo marcador.

trans-unit.source: Calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.Enumerate%2A> method to copy the path data to the `points` and `types` arrays.
trans-unit.target: Chamadas de <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.Enumerate%2A> método para copiar os dados de caminho para o `points` e `types` matrizes.

trans-unit.source: Lists this copied data on the right side of the screen.
trans-unit.target: Lista os dados copiados no lado direito da tela.

trans-unit.source: Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Permite que um objeto tente liberar recursos e executar outras operações de limpeza antes de ser recuperado pela coleta de lixo.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the path associated with this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator" /> contains a curve.
trans-unit.target: Indica se o caminho associado a este <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator" /> contém ou não uma curva.

trans-unit.source: This method returns <see langword="true" /> if the current subpath contains a curve; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Este método retorna <see langword="true" /> se subcaminho atual contém uma curva; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: All curves in a path are stored as sequences of Bézier splines.
trans-unit.target: Todas as curvas em um caminho são armazenadas como sequências de splines de Bézier.

trans-unit.source: For example, when you add an ellipse to a path, you specify the upper-left corner, the width, and the height of the ellipse's bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, quando você adiciona uma elipse a um caminho, especifique o canto superior esquerdo, a largura e a altura do retângulo delimitador da elipse.

trans-unit.source: Those numbers (upper-left corner, width, and height) are not stored in the path; instead; the ellipse is converted to a sequence of four Bézier splines.
trans-unit.target: Esses números (canto superior esquerdo, largura e altura) não são armazenados no caminho; em vez disso, elipse é convertida em uma sequência de splines de Bézier quatro.

trans-unit.source: The path stores the endpoints and control points of those Bézier splines.
trans-unit.target: Os pontos de controle desses splines de Bézier e os pontos de extremidade de repositórios de caminho.

trans-unit.source: A path stores an array of data points, each of which belongs to a line or a Bézier spline.
trans-unit.target: Um caminho armazena uma matriz de pontos de dados, cada um deles pertence a uma linha ou um spline de Bézier.

trans-unit.source: If some of the points in the array belong to Bézier splines, then <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.HasCurve%2A> returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se alguns pontos na matriz de pertencem ao splines de Bézier, em seguida, <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.HasCurve%2A> retorna `true`.

trans-unit.source: If all points in the array belong to lines, then <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.HasCurve%2A> returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se todos os pontos na matriz pertencem a linhas, em seguida, <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.HasCurve%2A> retorna `false`.

trans-unit.source: Certain methods flatten a path, which means that all the curves in the path are converted to sequences of lines.
trans-unit.target: Certos métodos nivelar um demarcador, o que significa que todas as curvas no caminho são convertidas em sequências de linhas.

trans-unit.source: After a path has been flattened, <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.HasCurve%2A> will always return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Depois que um caminho bidimensionais, <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.HasCurve%2A> sempre retornará `false`.

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.Flatten%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.Widen%2A>, or <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.Warp%2A> method of the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath> class will flatten a path.
trans-unit.target: Chamando o <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.Flatten%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.Widen%2A>, ou <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.Warp%2A> método o <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath> classe nivele um caminho.

trans-unit.source: The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OnPaint%2A> event object.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir foi projetado para uso com o Windows Forms e requer <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`, uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OnPaint%2A> objeto de evento.

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: O código executa as seguintes ações:

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath> object, `myPath`.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath> objeto `myPath`.

trans-unit.source: Adds three lines, a rectangle, and an ellipse.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona três linhas, um retângulo e uma elipse.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator> object for `myPath`.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator> de objeto para `myPath`.

trans-unit.source: Tests to see if the current path `myPath` contains a curve.
trans-unit.target: Testa se o caminho atual `myPath` contém uma curva.

trans-unit.source: Shows the result of the test in a message box.
trans-unit.target: Mostra o resultado do teste em uma caixa de mensagem.

trans-unit.source: Moves the iterator to the next marker in the path.
trans-unit.target: Move o iterador para o próximo marcador no caminho.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> object to which the points will be copied.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> para o qual os pontos serão copiados.

trans-unit.source: This <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator" /> object has a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> object associated with it.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator" /> tem um objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> associado a ele.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextMarker(System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath)" /> method increments the associated <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> to the next marker in its path and copies all the points contained between the current marker and the next marker (or end of path) to a second <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> object passed in to the parameter.
trans-unit.target: O método <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextMarker(System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath)" /> incrementa o <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> associado para o próximo marcador em seu caminho e copia todos os pontos contidos entre o marcador atual e o próximo marcador (ou o final do caminho) para um segundo objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> passado para o parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: The number of points between this marker and the next.
trans-unit.target: O número de pontos entre esse marcador e o próximo.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.SetMarkers%2A> method to set markers in a path.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.SetMarkers%2A> método para definir marcadores em um caminho.

trans-unit.source: Markers are used to create groups of subpaths.
trans-unit.target: Marcadores são usados para criar grupos de subcaminhos.

trans-unit.source: One or more subpaths can be between two markers.
trans-unit.target: Um ou mais subcaminhos podem ser entre dois marcadores.

trans-unit.source: The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OnPaint%2A> event object.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir foi projetado para uso com o Windows Forms e requer <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`, uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OnPaint%2A> objeto de evento.

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: O código executa as seguintes ações:

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath> object.
trans-unit.target: Cria um objeto <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath>.

trans-unit.source: Adds three lines, a rectangle, an ellipse, and two markers.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona três linhas, um retângulo, uma elipse e dois marcadores.

trans-unit.source: Lists the values of all the path's points to the left side of the screen.
trans-unit.target: Lista os valores de todos os pontos do caminho para o lado esquerdo da tela.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator> object.
trans-unit.target: Cria um objeto <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath> object, `myPathSection`, to receive copied points.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath> objeto, `myPathSection`, para receber pontos copiados.

trans-unit.source: Calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextMarker%2A> method, which iterates to the first marker and copies all the points contained between that marker and the next to `myPathSection`.
trans-unit.target: Chamadas de <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextMarker%2A> método, que repete-se para o primeiro marcador e copia todos os pontos contidos entre o marcador e o lado `myPathSection`.

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of points copied to `markerPoints`.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o número de pontos copiados `markerPoints`.

trans-unit.source: Lists the marker number (the first marker) and number of points it contains to the right side of the screen.
trans-unit.target: Lista o número de marcador (o primeiro marcador) e o número de pontos que ele contém o lado direito da tela.

trans-unit.source: [out] The integer reference supplied to this parameter receives the index of the point that starts a subpath.
trans-unit.target: [out] A referência de inteiro fornecida para esse parâmetro recebe o índice do ponto que inicia um subcaminho.

trans-unit.source: [out] The integer reference supplied to this parameter receives the index of the point that ends the subpath to which <c>startIndex</c> points.
trans-unit.target: [out] A referência de inteiro fornecida para esse parâmetro recebe o índice do ponto que termina o subcaminho para o qual <c>startIndex</c> aponta.

trans-unit.source: Increments the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator" /> to the next marker in the path and returns the start and stop indexes by way of the [out] parameters.
trans-unit.target: Incrementa o <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator" /> para o próximo marcador no caminho e retorna os índices de início e parada por meio dos parâmetros [out].

trans-unit.source: The number of points between this marker and the next.
trans-unit.target: O número de pontos entre esse marcador e o próximo.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.SetMarkers%2A> method to set markers in a path.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.SetMarkers%2A> método para definir marcadores em um caminho.

trans-unit.source: Markers are used to create groups of subpaths.
trans-unit.target: Marcadores são usados para criar grupos de subcaminhos.

trans-unit.source: One or more subpaths can be between two markers.
trans-unit.target: Um ou mais subcaminhos podem ser entre dois marcadores.

trans-unit.source: The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OnPaint%2A> event object.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir foi projetado para uso com o Windows Forms e requer <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`, uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OnPaint%2A> objeto de evento.

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: O código executa as seguintes ações:

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath> object.
trans-unit.target: Cria um objeto <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath>.

trans-unit.source: Adds three lines, a rectangle, and an ellipse ¾ with markers between each.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona três linhas, um retângulo e uma elipse ¾ com marcadores entre cada um deles.

trans-unit.source: Draws the values for the array of points to the screen.
trans-unit.target: Desenha os valores para a matriz de pontos na tela.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator> object.
trans-unit.target: Cria um objeto <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator>.

trans-unit.source: Calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextMarker%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Chama o método <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextMarker%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Uses the values returned from the iterative calls to <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextMarker%2A> to draw the start and stop points for each marker to the screen.
trans-unit.target: Usa os valores retornados de chamadas iterativas para <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextMarker%2A> para desenhar a iniciar e parar pontos para cada marcador para a tela.

trans-unit.source: Draws the value for the total number of points to the screen.
trans-unit.target: Desenha o valor para o número total de pontos na tela.

trans-unit.source: [out] Receives the point type shared by all points in the group.
trans-unit.target: [out] Recebe o tipo de ponto compartilhado por todos os pontos no grupo.

trans-unit.source: Possible types can be retrieved from the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathPointType" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Os tipos possíveis podem ser recuperados da enumeração <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathPointType" />.

trans-unit.source: [out] Receives the starting index of the group of points.
trans-unit.target: [out] Recebe o índice inicial do grupo de pontos.

trans-unit.source: [out] Receives the ending index of the group of points.
trans-unit.target: [out] Recebe o índice final do grupo de pontos.

trans-unit.source: Gets the starting index and the ending index of the next group of data points that all have the same type.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o índice inicial e o índice final do próximo grupo de pontos de dados, todos os quais têm o mesmo tipo.

trans-unit.source: This method returns the number of data points in the group.
trans-unit.target: Esse método retorna o número de pontos de dados no grupo.

trans-unit.source: If there are no more groups in the path, this method returns 0.
trans-unit.target: Se não houver mais grupos no caminho, esse método retornará 0.

trans-unit.source: The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OnPaint%2A> event object.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir foi projetado para uso com o Windows Forms e requer <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`, uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OnPaint%2A> objeto de evento.

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: O código executa as seguintes ações:

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath> object.
trans-unit.target: Cria um objeto <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath>.

trans-unit.source: Adds three lines, a rectangle, and an ellipse.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona três linhas, um retângulo e uma elipse.

trans-unit.source: Lists the values of all the points to the left side of the screen.
trans-unit.target: Lista os valores de todos os pontos para o lado esquerdo da tela.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator> and rewinds it.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator> e Rebobina a ele.

trans-unit.source: In a `for` loop, iterates through the points using the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextPathType%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextPathType%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Em um `for` loop, itera por meio de pontos usando o <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextPathType%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextPathType%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: Uses the values returned from the iterative calls to list the subpath number, the number of points in it, and the type of the path points to the right side of the screen.
trans-unit.target: Usa os valores retornados de chamadas iterativas para listar o número de subcaminho, o número de pontos nela e o tipo dos pontos de caminho para o lado direito da tela.

trans-unit.source: Displays the value for the total number of points to the screen.
trans-unit.target: Exibe o valor para o número total de pontos na tela.

trans-unit.source: Note that `ListPathPoints` is a helper function that separates most (not all) of the display code from the graphics path code.
trans-unit.target: Observe que `ListPathPoints` é uma função auxiliar que separa a maioria (nem todos os) do código de exibição de código de caminho do gráfico.

trans-unit.source: Moves the subpath to the next subpath in the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" />.
trans-unit.target: Move o subcaminho para o próximo subcaminho no <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> that is to have its data points set to match the data points of the retrieved figure (subpath) for this iterator.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> que deve definir seus pontos de dados para corresponder aos pontos de dados da figura recuperada (subcaminho) desse iterador.

trans-unit.source: [out] Indicates whether the current subpath is closed.
trans-unit.target: [out] Indica se o subcaminho atual está fechado.

trans-unit.source: It is <see langword="true" /> if the if the figure is closed, otherwise it is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Será <see langword="true" /> se a figura for fechada; caso contrário, será <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the next figure (subpath) from the associated path of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a próxima figura (subcaminho) do caminho associado deste <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator" />.

trans-unit.source: The number of data points in the retrieved figure (subpath).
trans-unit.target: O número de pontos de dados na figura recuperada (subcaminho).

trans-unit.source: If there are no more figures to retrieve, zero is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se não houver mais figuras a serem recuperadas, zero será retornado.

trans-unit.source: The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OnPaint%2A> event object.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir foi projetado para uso com o Windows Forms e requer <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`, uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OnPaint%2A> objeto de evento.

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: O código executa as seguintes ações:

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath> object.
trans-unit.target: Cria um objeto <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath>.

trans-unit.source: Adds three lines, a rectangle, an ellipse, and two markers.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona três linhas, um retângulo, uma elipse e dois marcadores.

trans-unit.source: Lists the values of all the path's points to the left side of the screen.
trans-unit.target: Lista os valores de todos os pontos do caminho para o lado esquerdo da tela.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator> object.
trans-unit.target: Cria um objeto <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath> object, `myPathSection`, to receive copied points.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath> objeto, `myPathSection`, para receber pontos copiados.

trans-unit.source: Calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextSubpath%2A> method, which iterates to the third subpath (figure) and copies all the points contained in that subpath to the `myPathSection` path, and also returns the number of points copied to `subpathPoints`.
trans-unit.target: Chamadas de <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextSubpath%2A> método, que repete a terceiro subcaminho (Figura) e copia todos os pontos contidos desse subcaminho para o `myPathSection` caminho e também retorna o número de pontos copiado para `subpathPoints`.

trans-unit.source: Lists the subpath number and number of points it contains to the right side of the screen.
trans-unit.target: Lista o número de subcaminho e o número de pontos que ele contém o lado direito da tela.

trans-unit.source: [out] Receives the starting index of the next subpath.
trans-unit.target: [out] Recebe o índice inicial do próximo subcaminho.

trans-unit.source: [out] Receives the ending index of the next subpath.
trans-unit.target: [out] Recebe o índice final do próximo subcaminho.

trans-unit.source: [out] Indicates whether the subpath is closed.
trans-unit.target: [out] Indica se o subcaminho está fechado.

trans-unit.source: Moves the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator" /> to the next subpath in the path.
trans-unit.target: Move o <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator" /> para o próximo subcaminho no caminho.

trans-unit.source: The start index and end index of the next subpath are contained in the [out] parameters.
trans-unit.target: O índice inicial e o índice final do próximo subcaminho estão contidos nos parâmetros [out].

trans-unit.source: The number of subpaths in the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> object.
trans-unit.target: O número de subcaminhos no objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OnPaint%2A> event object.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir foi projetado para uso com o Windows Forms e requer <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`, uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OnPaint%2A> objeto de evento.

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: O código executa as seguintes ações:

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath> object.
trans-unit.target: Cria um objeto <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath>.

trans-unit.source: Adds three lines, a rectangle, and an ellipse.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona três linhas, um retângulo e uma elipse.

trans-unit.source: Draws the values for the array of points to the screen.
trans-unit.target: Desenha os valores para a matriz de pontos na tela.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator> object.
trans-unit.target: Cria um objeto <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator>.

trans-unit.source: Calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextSubpath%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Chama o método <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextSubpath%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Uses the values returned from the iterative calls to <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextSubpath%2A> to draw the start and stop values for each subpath to the screen.
trans-unit.target: Usa os valores retornados de chamadas iterativas para <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextSubpath%2A> para desenhar a iniciar e parar valores para cada subcaminho para a tela.

trans-unit.source: Draws the value for the total number of subpaths to the screen.
trans-unit.target: Desenha o valor para o número total de subcaminhos na tela.

trans-unit.source: Rewinds this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator" /> to the beginning of its associated path.
trans-unit.target: Retrocede esse <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator" /> para o início de seu caminho associado.

trans-unit.source: The first time you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextSubpath%2A> method of an iterator, it gets the first figure (subpath) of that iterator's associated path.
trans-unit.target: Na primeira vez que você chamar o <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextSubpath%2A> método de um iterador, ele obtém o primeiro número (subcaminho) do caminho associado que do iterador.

trans-unit.source: The second time, it gets the second figure, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Na segunda vez, ele obtém a segunda figura e assim por diante.

trans-unit.source: When you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.Rewind%2A> method, the sequence starts over; that is, after you call <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.Rewind%2A>, the next call to <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextSubpath%2A> gets the first figure in the path.
trans-unit.target: Quando você chama o <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.Rewind%2A> método, a sequência inicia; ou seja, depois de chamar <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.Rewind%2A>, a próxima chamada para <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextSubpath%2A> obtém o primeiro número no caminho.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextMarker%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextPathType%2A> methods behave similarly.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextMarker%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextPathType%2A> métodos se comportam da mesma forma.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of subpaths in the path.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de subcaminhos no caminho.

trans-unit.source: The number of subpaths in the path.
trans-unit.target: O número de subcaminhos no caminho.
